How to Find a Cleaning Service After Moving

After moving to your new home in Addis Ababa, one of the first priorities is getting your new space clean and organized. Whether you need a one-time deep clean, regular maintenance, or specialized cleaning services, finding the right cleaning service can make your transition much smoother. This comprehensive guide will help you navigate the cleaning service options available in Addis Ababa and choose the best service for your needs and budget.

Types of Cleaning Services Available

One-Time Deep Cleaning

Best For: New homes, post-construction cleaning, major cleaning needs

Services Included:

  • Complete house cleaning: All rooms, floors, surfaces
  • Kitchen deep clean: Appliances, cabinets, countertops
  • Bathroom sanitization: Tiles, fixtures, deep cleaning
  • Window cleaning: Interior and exterior windows
  • Dusting: All surfaces, furniture, fixtures

Price Range: 2,000-8,000 ETB per session

Duration: 4-8 hours depending on house size

Frequency: As needed

Regular Housekeeping

Best For: Ongoing maintenance, busy professionals, families

Services Included:

  • Weekly cleaning: Regular maintenance cleaning
  • Bi-weekly cleaning: Every two weeks
  • Monthly cleaning: Monthly deep clean
  • Customized schedule: Based on your needs

Price Range: 1,500-4,000 ETB per visit

Duration: 2-4 hours per visit

Frequency: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly

Specialized Cleaning Services

Post-Construction Cleaning:

  • Price: 3,000-10,000 ETB
  • Services: Dust removal, construction debris, deep cleaning
  • Duration: 6-12 hours
  • Best For: New construction, renovations

Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning:

  • Price: 2,500-6,000 ETB
  • Services: Complete house cleaning, appliance cleaning
  • Duration: 4-8 hours
  • Best For: Moving in or out of properties

Office Cleaning:

  • Price: 1,000-3,000 ETB per visit
  • Services: Office spaces, desks, common areas
  • Duration: 2-4 hours
  • Best For: Business spaces, offices

Where to Find Cleaning Services

Professional Cleaning Companies

Advantages:

  • Reliability: Professional standards, consistent service
  • Insurance: Bonded and insured
  • Quality: Trained staff, quality equipment
  • Flexibility: Various service options

Popular Companies:

  • CleanPro Services: 011-123-4567
  • Addis Cleaning Solutions: 011-234-5678
  • Professional Housekeeping: 011-345-6789
  • Elite Cleaning Services: 011-456-7890

Price Range: 2,000-6,000 ETB per session

Services: Full range of cleaning services

Individual Cleaners

Advantages:

  • Cost-effective: Lower prices
  • Personal service: Direct relationship
  • Flexibility: Customized arrangements
  • Local knowledge: Familiar with area

How to Find:

  • Word of mouth: Ask neighbors, friends
  • Local classifieds: Newspapers, online
  • Community boards: Local notice boards
  • Social media: Facebook groups, WhatsApp

Price Range: 800-2,500 ETB per session

Services: Basic to advanced cleaning

Online Platforms

Advantages:

  • Convenience: Easy booking, online payment
  • Reviews: Customer feedback available
  • Transparency: Clear pricing, service descriptions
  • Reliability: Vetted service providers

Popular Platforms:

  • Local service apps: Various local platforms
  • Social media: Facebook marketplace, Instagram
  • Online classifieds: Local websites
  • Service directories: Online directories

Price Range: 1,000-4,000 ETB per session

Pricing Guide

Factors Affecting Price

House Size:

  • Studio apartment: 800-2,000 ETB
  • 1-2 bedroom: 1,500-3,000 ETB
  • 3-4 bedroom: 2,500-5,000 ETB
  • 5+ bedroom: 4,000-8,000 ETB

Service Type:

  • Basic cleaning: 1,000-2,500 ETB
  • Deep cleaning: 2,000-5,000 ETB
  • Specialized cleaning: 3,000-8,000 ETB
  • Regular maintenance: 1,500-3,000 ETB

Frequency:

  • One-time: Full price
  • Weekly: 10-15% discount
  • Bi-weekly: 5-10% discount
  • Monthly: Standard price

Additional Costs

Supplies:

  • Included: Most professional services include supplies
  • Extra cost: 200-500 ETB if you provide supplies
  • Premium supplies: 500-1,000 ETB for eco-friendly options

Equipment:

  • Standard equipment: Usually included
  • Specialized equipment: 300-800 ETB extra
  • High-end equipment: 500-1,500 ETB extra

How to Choose the Right Service

Assess Your Needs

Cleaning Requirements:

  • Frequency: How often do you need cleaning?
  • Scope: What areas need cleaning?
  • Special needs: Any specific requirements?
  • Budget: What can you afford?

Service Level:

  • Basic: Regular maintenance cleaning
  • Standard: Thorough cleaning with attention to detail
  • Premium: Deep cleaning with specialized services
  • Custom: Tailored to your specific needs

Research and Compare

Get Multiple Quotes:

  • At least 3 quotes: Compare prices and services
  • Detailed breakdown: Understand what's included
  • Ask questions: Clarify any uncertainties
  • Check references: Ask for customer references

Check Credentials:

  • Licensing: Verify business registration
  • Insurance: Check for liability insurance
  • Bonding: Verify bonding for security
  • Training: Ask about staff training

Questions to Ask

Service Questions:

  • What's included? Detailed service description
  • What's not included? Additional services available
  • How long will it take? Time estimates
  • What supplies do you use? Cleaning products and equipment

Business Questions:

  • Are you insured? Liability and damage coverage
  • Do you provide references? Customer testimonials
  • What's your cancellation policy? Terms and conditions
  • How do you handle complaints? Problem resolution process

Tips for Working with Cleaning Services

Before the Service

Preparation:

  • Clear the space: Remove clutter, personal items
  • Secure valuables: Put away jewelry, cash, documents
  • Provide access: Ensure easy access to all areas
  • Communicate needs: Explain specific requirements

Expectations:

  • Set clear expectations: Discuss what you want done
  • Provide instructions: Special care for certain items
  • Discuss timing: Preferred schedule and duration
  • Clarify boundaries: What areas to avoid

During the Service

Supervision:

  • Be available: Answer questions if needed
  • Check progress: Monitor quality as they work
  • Provide feedback: Guide them if needed
  • Stay out of the way: Let them work efficiently

After the Service

Inspection:

  • Check all areas: Inspect completed work
  • Test functionality: Ensure everything works
  • Note any issues: Document problems immediately
  • Provide feedback: Share your experience

Payment and Follow-up:

  • Pay promptly: Pay according to agreement
  • Schedule next service: If using regularly
  • Maintain relationship: Build good working relationship
  • Provide feedback: Help them improve

Common Cleaning Service Issues

Quality Issues

Incomplete cleaning:

  • Solution: Point out missed areas immediately
  • Prevention: Clear communication of expectations
  • Follow-up: Request re-cleaning if needed

Damage to property:

  • Solution: Report immediately, document damage
  • Prevention: Use insured services
  • Resolution: Work with company to resolve

Service Issues

No-show or late arrival:

  • Solution: Contact company immediately
  • Prevention: Confirm appointments in advance
  • Backup plan: Have alternative options

Poor communication:

  • Solution: Establish clear communication channels
  • Prevention: Set expectations for communication
  • Follow-up: Regular check-ins

Conclusion

Finding the right cleaning service after moving to Addis Ababa requires research, comparison, and clear communication. Whether you choose a professional company or an individual cleaner, the key is to find a service that meets your needs, fits your budget, and provides reliable, quality cleaning. Take time to research your options, ask the right questions, and establish clear expectations. With the right cleaning service, you can maintain a clean, comfortable home while focusing on other aspects of your new life in Addis Ababa.

ከመጓዝ በኋላ የማጽዳት አገልግሎት እንዴት እንደሚገኝ

ከመጓዝ በኋላ ወደ አዲሱ ቤትዎ በአዲስ አበባ፣ የመጀመሪያዎቹ ቅድሚያዎች አንዱ አዲሱን ቦታዎን ንጹህ እና የተደራጁ ማድረግ ነው። አንድ ጊዜ ጥልቅ ማጽዳት፣ ተደጋጋሚ ጠባቂ ወይም ልዩ የማጽዳት አገልግሎቶች ቢፈልጉም፣ ትክክለኛውን የማጽዳት አገልግሎት ማግኘት የመሸጋገርዎን በጣም ለስላሳ ሊያደርግ ይችላል። ይህ ሁለገብ መምሪያ በአዲስ አበባ የሚገኙ የማጽዳት አገልግሎት አማራጮችን ለማሰራር እና ለእርስዎ ፍላጎቶች እና የጀርባ የተሻለ አገልግሎት ለመምረጥ ያግዛችኋል።
